title: Font Suggestions Please
content: What would be a nice font for a corporate tech company with a military audience?
author: wyclef

comments.content:
[Apex Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20091204155348/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexSans/mudTyper+Weights/) came to my mind, though I think I like Stephen’s ideas better.

Is this for a logo, or something else?
I have to agree with Stephen about United. Given the huge number of options afforded by United for only $300, it’s a steal for this application.

Sophisto might do the trick as well?

[http://www.macrhino.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20091204155348/http:/www.macrhino.com/ "http://www.macrhino.com")
